transcript:
Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Good afternoon, sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: I am Vinay Singh speaking, sir, from IndiaMART. A video meeting was arranged with you, sir, right? Your feedback came, sir, a negative feedback for your account manager, sir. Right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Uh, so I called for that, sir, that your account manager dropped a buylead this morning. 
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Dekhiye ek hi cheez ka do baar bhej rahe hain.
Executive: Ek hi ek baar
Customer: Do baar aa gayi hai. Teen baar, teen baar hai.
Executive: Maybe technical glitch ho gaya. Ek hi ek hi item ka teen alag alag buylead hai. Ek hi buylead teen baar aa gaya hai sir.
Customer: Hmm. Ek minute.
Executive: Ek baar check kijiyega. Location se pata chal jayega ki ek product ka jaise abhi available hua tha. Jaise ek product mein teen char logon ne requirement
Customer: Dono jalgaon ka hi hai.
Executive: Dono jalgaon ka hi hai.
Customer: Aur teesra teesra bhi maharashtra ka hai.
Executive: Haan, maharashtra ka hai. Sir, waise jaise humne unko update kiya hai ki jo bhi buylead available ho, gujarat aur maharashtra ko. Morning mein aap check kijiye.
Customer: Wo apna baat wo tha to viscometer to aapne bheja hi nahi.
Executive: Okay. To sir jaise ki agar buylead available hoti hai to wo aapko priority pe drop kar dete hain. Right? Jaise abhi aapko is product mein teen buylead available hai. To humne unko guide kiya hua hai ki aapka jo bhi jis jis category pe buylead sir ka available hai gujarat aur maharashtra se wo sir ko proper aap whatsapp pe drop kar dijiye aur buylead unko properly update kare. Sir is buylead ko consume kar liya hai aapne sir?
Customer: Konsa?
Executive: Ye jo teenon buylead aapko bheja gaya hai.
Customer: Nahi maine abhi.
Executive: Sir priority pe consume kar lijiye. Otherwise ye hoga ki jaise hi aap supplier connect karenge to buylead purchase ho jati hai. Ye bhi mere kaam ki nahi hai. Ye value vacuum pump likh rahe hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm. To.
Executive: Kyunki sir dekhiye aapka concern open hai. Ek baar aap video meeting pe aa jate to sir hum isko aur bhi correct kar pate sir. Kyunki aapne discussion hua tha kaha tha ki sir 11 after 11:45 aapki team call kijiye aap available rahenge. To sir abhi aap available hain?
Customer: Nahi abhi to main nahi hu.
Executive: Abhi aap busy hain. To sir main kab tak aapko sir call karu aap mujhe ye bataiye.
Customer: Aap 3 baje kijiye.
Executive: 3 baje call karu. Sir jo aapka concern hai main wo close kar du kyunki jo feedback hai aapne account manager ke liye diya hua hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: To usko main close kar deta hu sir.
Customer: Kyun close kar rahe ho?
Executive: Kya hai sir?
Customer: Close kyun kar rahe ho?
Executive: Nahi nahi jo feedback aapne jo diya hai sir wo account manager pe gaya hua hai to main wahi puch raha hu wo feedback sir to aapke jo service provide kar rahe hain.
Customer: Wo aapka account manager agar sahi kaam nahi karega to wo hum feedback wahi batayenge na jo.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Haan.
Executive: To matlab aap ye keh rahe hain ki jo account manager proper padh li aapke catalog pe work nahi kar rahe hain, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aapko pehle 3 baje video meeting pe sir connect karta hu. Okay.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir kindly sir 3 baje available rahiyega aur system pe rahiyega to aur hamare liye better hoga sir.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received same buylead multiple times.

- Customer states account manager not working properly.

- Customer says viscometer buylead not received.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issue of duplicate buyleads.

- Executive offered a video meeting to address concerns.

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, video meeting, feedback
